# Class ClassificationResultData

Classification result from text classification.

Contains an array of class labels from classification operations.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy getClasses

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this data.

#### Returns void

Inherited from BaseData.destroy




### getClasses

  * getClasses(): string[]

Retrieves the classes.

#### Returns string[]

An array of classes, or undefined if no classes are found
